Logging

class lib.log.Logger(sfr)

Bases: object

__init__(sfr)
__weakref__

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

integrate_charge() → None

Integrate battery charge in Joules

log() → None

Calls :class:’lib.clock.Clock’ of all logging functions

log_imu() → None

Logs IMU data

log_power_full() → None

Calls log_power and log_solar

log_pwr(buspower: float, pwr: list) → None

Logs the power draw of every pdm

Parameters

  • buspower (float) – power draw of bus

  • pwr (list) – array of power draws from each pdm, in W. [1.3421 W, 0 W, .42123 W…]

log_solar(gen: list) → None

Logs the solar power generation from each panel (sum of A and B) :param gen: array of power inputs from each panel, in Watts :type gen: list

update_orbits() → None

Update orbits log when sun is detected
